cu.explanation_en: Setting the remote SCTP control port to 99999 exceeds the valid port range, causing SCTP connection failure.

du.explanation_en: Setting SS PBCH block power to 100 dBm exceeds the valid power range, causing synchronization failure.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SS PBCH 區塊功率設定為 100 dBm 超過有效功率範圍，會導致同步失敗。
